054313cfc5b4eebdc97456ab65388d630997db00.query: UPDATE torrent_info SET free = TRUE WHERE id = ANY($1);

0675ed65896b90158137536989c268709f55e563.query: WITH ret1 AS ( INSERT INTO users(email, username, password, passkey) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4) RETURNING id, email, username, passkey, role),ret2 AS ( INSERT INTO user_info(id, username, registerTime, lastActivity, rank) SELECT (SELECT id FROM ret1), $2, NOW(), NOW(), name FROM rank WHERE rank.id = 1) SELECT id, email, username, passkey, role FROM ret1;

1020c537df8fab29df9baeb108e67748dc9228ff.query: INSERT INTO torrent_status(tid, uid, status, upload, download) VALUES($1, $2, $3, $4, $5) ON CONFLICT (tid, uid) DO UPDATE SET status = $3, upload = torrent_status.upload + $4, download = torrent_status.download + $5;

10cc74d99cbeb3d976de9cdf3073582f8ea8fc6d.query: SELECT torrent_info.id, title, poster, tag, lastEdit, length, free, downloading, uploading, finished FROM torrent_info INNER JOIN torrent ON torrent_info.id = torrent.id WHERE visible = TRUE AND torrent_info.id = ANY($1) ORDER BY CASE WHEN $3 = 'title' THEN 2 WHEN $3 = 'poster' THEN 3 WHEN $3 = 'lastedit' THEN 5 WHEN $3 = 'length' THEN 6 WHEN $3 = 'downloading' THEN 8 WHEN $3 = 'uploading' THEN 9 WHEN $3 = 'finished' THEN 10 END ASC LIMIT 20 OFFSET $2;

1550c6080fbd3b59ee1aba656b01a8bd564c2a54.query: UPDATE users SET passkey = $1 WHERE username = $2;

1a0ad49e551d48bc122ae4c8f73d95106e9b0a28.query: SELECT id, upload, download, registerTime FROM user_info WHERE username = $1

1ae3e403e10c780d77d66d39f6d51476d836725e.query: SELECT torrent_info.id, title, poster, tag, lastEdit, length,free, downloading, uploading, finished FROM torrent_info INNER JOIN torrent ON torrent_info.id = torrent.id WHERE visible = TRUE AND stick = TRUE ORDER BY lastEdit DESC;

1b786843a6be3b725656bcd803af16c7a979e444.query: SELECT * FROM tag ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT $1;

1f0abc9836e6eca63e580be12f5d73a7329fe6f5.query: INSERT INTO torrent_info(title, poster, description, createTime, lastEdit, tag) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, NOW(), NOW(), $4) RETURNING id, visible;

22368b379d8c9f89bced04814cc464acc31ce449.query: SELECT torrent_info.id, title, length, torrent_status.upload, torrent_status.download, torrent_info.free FROM torrent_status INNER JOIN torrent ON torrent_status.tid = torrent.id INNER JOIN torrent_info ON torrent.id = torrent_info.id WHERE status = 1 AND uid = $1;

227abd4e4d9baeb2e3e41336137a39b817ab20a0.query: WITH ret AS (UPDATE activation SET used = TRUE WHERE id = $1) UPDATE users SET activated = TRUE WHERE id = $1;

2bc77f3a229ea2e42fa632b20a1e5678fa296b17.query: INSERT INTO torrent(id, name, length, comment, files, info, infohash) VALUES($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = $2, length = $3, comment = $4, files = $5, info = $6, infohash = $7;

31af7cbe54f12b7dd1e6a7f3a2e318387e4ab8b5.query: UPDATE torrent_info SET stick = FALSE WHERE id = ANY($1);

3720c7b66e4154b3999f67e7feaa6db560919f27.query: SELECT id, email, username, passkey, role FROM users WHERE id = $1;

39ea4c1b0d92fc49ec3ab7e9167128a1b12a37fa.query: UPDATE user_info SET money = CASE WHEN username = $1 THEN money - $3WHEN username = $2 THEN money + $3END WHERE username in ($1, $2)

3e8d11d9b0591f565eb958ab0101607f911b5a3f.query: UPDATE torrent_info SET free = FALSE WHERE id = ANY($1);

42d78adb0b34afb68fa209635248f434d45a0ab1.query: SELECT torrent_info.id, title, poster, tag, lastEdit, length, free, downloading, uploading, finished FROM torrent_info INNER JOIN torrent ON torrent_info.id = torrent.id WHERE visible = TRUE AND ($1::VARCHAR[] <@ tag) AND stick = FALSE ORDER BY CASE WHEN $3 = 'title' THEN 2 WHEN $3 = 'poster' THEN 3 WHEN $3 = 'lastedit' THEN 5 WHEN $3 = 'length' THEN 6 WHEN $3 = 'downloading' THEN 8 WHEN $3 = 'uploading' THEN 9 WHEN $3 = 'finished' THEN 10 END ASC LIMIT 20 OFFSET $2;

445817b9bb879ea656b400cabfd1b15ac0ef2244.query: WITH rt AS (UPDATE user_info SET invitor = $1 WHERE id = $2) UPDATE invitations SET usage = TRUE WHERE code = $3;

46b1c3d7bc9568afbe08f47c12967fb519a35637.query: SELECT id, username, password, role, activated FROM users WHERE username = $1;

4b19e4270fbc5b086e8e58d8b65897d589bb637f.query: SELECT rank.id, name, role, rank.upload, age, next FROM rank INNER JOIN user_info ON rank.name = user_info.rank WHERE user_info.username = $1;

4b3761fd78658f738687441e4315e904ee052c90.query: UPDATE torrent_info SET stick = TRUE WHERE id = ANY($1);

4e7e8856be46fc2e8ad758d21012f63efa950468.query: SELECT * FROM torrent_status WHERE tid = $1 AND uid = $2;

517a15fd516e892c221ed81ad996fdbcbdf6d91a.query: SELECT torrent_info.id, title, length, torrent_status.upload, torrent_status.download, torrent_info.free FROM torrent_status INNER JOIN torrent ON torrent_status.tid = torrent.id INNER JOIN torrent_info ON torrent.id = torrent_info.id WHERE torrent_status.finished = FALSE AND status = 2 AND uid = $1;

52e1a68533bf5dc82005967b33bc1dddf1f7cb49.query: INSERT INTO activation(id, code) VALUES($1, $2) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET code = $2;

546ec2490296998428dd6ee3b1ea9ba8ec88bc10.query: INSERT INTO tag(name) VALUES($1) ON CONFLICT (name) DO UPDATE SET amount = tag.amount + 1;

57aacededf6aa8fdb703614b44e63131ba8cffd0.query: SELECT torrent_info.id, title, poster, description, tag, visible, createTime, lastEdit, free, downloading, uploading, finished, length, files, infohash FROM torrent_info LEFT JOIN torrent ON torrent_info.id = torrent.id WHERE torrent_info.id = $1;

5ca74f7f694b446bf0ad2425fc19c08491ca5a57.query: SELECT id, email, username, passkey, role FROM users WHERE email = $1;

674af5859c4e82fae485f79d637818745a6f0db6.query: UPDATE torrent_status SET finished = TRUE WHERE tid = $1 AND uid = $2;

6a452ba84452fc3b805baa4f349cfa7c688bc25b.query: UPDATE user_info SET upload = upload + $1, download = download + $2 WHERE id = $3 RETURNING id, upload, download, registerTime;

6d62ad8a9daf95a14eca4744c3cb89997b91142a.query: UPDATE users SET password = $1 WHERE username = $2;

71232b387d2d2dea5bc57a58f891aa5f215fafbb.query: SELECT torrent_info.id, title, length, torrent_status.upload, torrent_status.download, torrent_info.free FROM torrent_status INNER JOIN torrent ON torrent_status.tid = torrent.id INNER JOIN torrent_info ON torrent.id = torrent_info.id WHERE status = 0 AND uid = $1;

7148b7cbfa168460aec841e24642eca77880f9a5.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM torrent_info WHERE visible = TRUE AND ($1::VARCHAR[] <@ tag) AND stick = FALSE;

726a3a100df97a6873a90910b5cc9c202520c4ce.query: INSERT INTO message(sender, receiver, title, body, sendTime) VALUES($1, $2, $3, $4, NOW());

75b24f3e23fd886115531e168801fcf9964dae61.query: SELECT id, sender, receiver, title, body, read, sendTime FROM message WHERE sender = $1 AND visibleSender = TRUE;

75e02dd2d9d8bf2ecdb17da953b5e192df62dbaa.query: UPDATE user_info SET other = $1 WHERE username = $2;

7abf8e37ee82eb654d00b207c60aadbd01b352c7.query: SELECT torrent_info.id, title, poster, tag, lastEdit, length, free, downloading, uploading, finished FROM torrent_info INNER JOIN torrent ON torrent_info.id = torrent.id WHERE poster = $1

7bd990f18de7d1df380aa7b3f840fdb7293add83.query: UPDATE user_info SET money = money + $1 WHERE id = ANY($2);

847f824138fed7549b9d7de550f5c4dfeafa72d1.query: SELECT id, title, poster, tag FROM torrent_info;

848f336bb11b67020339f8d16fae22d242f9f8d6.query: INSERT INTO invitations(sender, code, address) VALUES ($1, $2, $3) RETURNING *;

86f00d355721f3991497bc0426dd21b283ac781a.query: UPDATE tag SET amount = amount - 1 WHERE name = $1;

874a98e6801398f8ad348a6416d154aee88fbf86.query: SELECT torrent_info.id, title, poster, tag, lastEdit, length, free, downloading, uploading, finished FROM torrent_info INNER JOIN torrent ON torrent_info.id = torrent.id WHERE visible = FALSE;

8a82ebbcfe7f32838bc3b106e3401f25ca3ea95b.query: UPDATE user_info SET money = money + $1 WHERE username = $2;

8cf70483430b90cb61d0147ea2b8b9b7c3df54b7.query: SELECT torrent_info.id, title, poster, tag, lastEdit, length, free, downloading, uploading, finished FROM torrent_info INNER JOIN torrent ON torrent_info.id = torrent.id WHERE visible = TRUE AND torrent_info.id = ANY($1) ORDER BY CASE WHEN $3 = 'title' THEN 2 WHEN $3 = 'poster' THEN 3 WHEN $3 = 'lastedit' THEN 5 WHEN $3 = 'length' THEN 6 WHEN $3 = 'downloading' THEN 8 WHEN $3 = 'uploading' THEN 9 WHEN $3 = 'finished' THEN 10 END DESC LIMIT 20 OFFSET $2;

9c7dcb166a9f3ef41582e5e245591ee84158b7fd.query: SELECT torrent_info.id, title, poster, tag, lastEdit, length, free, downloading, uploading, finished FROM torrent_info INNER JOIN torrent ON torrent_info.id = torrent.id WHERE visible = TRUE AND ($1::VARCHAR[] <@ tag) AND stick = FALSE ORDER BY CASE WHEN $3 = 'title' THEN 2 WHEN $3 = 'poster' THEN 3 WHEN $3 = 'lastedit' THEN 5 WHEN $3 = 'length' THEN 6 WHEN $3 = 'downloading' THEN 8 WHEN $3 = 'uploading' THEN 9 WHEN $3 = 'finished' THEN 10 END DESC LIMIT 20 OFFSET $2;

9cff054a1d8aecfd79829a090803c4dc3cb78b1a.query: UPDATE user_info SET avatar = $1 WHERE username = $2;

ac15c66e3ff5e919d859f3d826934dd7579b1a0b.query: UPDATE message SET read = TRUE WHERE id = ANY($1) AND receiver = $2;

ac854e9db2cdfaf14b96c705cccfb49247d590e7.query: UPDATE users SET role = role & ~(1::BIGINT << $1) WHERE id = $2;

ace4ac9ada4c251c6e555420ec73c41dd41fbada.query: SELECT id, email, username, passkey, role FROM users WHERE username = $1;

ada6932dac73f69b17a5d253cdc2f765026f718e.query: SELECT id, email, username, passkey, role FROM users WHERE email = $1 OR upper(username) = upper($2);

b3d33c2cd104b818676ca7bbfd148416287733d5.query: UPDATE torrent_info SET visible = TRUE FROM torrent WHERE torrent_info.id = torrent.id AND torrent_info.id = ANY($1) RETURNING poster, visible, free, tag, length;

b68b6aad6fa0bad47f815d1a4888f4b337b15a23.query: SELECT users.id, users.username, registerTime, lastActivity, invitor, upload, download, user_info.money, rank, avatar, other, privacy, email, passkey FROM user_info INNER JOIN users ON user_info.id = users.id WHERE user_info.username = $1

b7a5116a3a5b4912524589754c239af77dc7a9da.query: INSERT INTO rank(name, role, upload, age, next) VALUES($1, $2, $3, $4, $5) ON CONFLICT (name) DO UPDATE SET name = $1, role = $2, upload = $3, age = $4, next = $5;

ba05438cf4a46f251c61432443f10d977565a331.query: UPDATE message SET visibleReceiver = FALSE WHERE id = ANY($1) AND receiver = $2;

c1a23df04e5b84200aa176e91aeca29ca933c143.query: UPDATE user_info SET privacy = $1 WHERE username = $2;

d13ad648962d0b3568f41fe4ccd430296ef0983c.query: UPDATE message SET visibleSender = FALSE WHERE id = ANY($1) AND sender = $2;

d1e2db6f97fe743e872e661e15fa9e9a7ec6af34.query: UPDATE user_info SET lastActivity = now() WHERE username = $1;

d502300253ada2e3bf02c93bc1e0d934a2c0e575.query: SELECT id, email, username, passkey, role FROM users WHERE (role & 1) = 0;

d65741f336ee6968503cb02bd6c028502868eaf0.query: UPDATE user_info SET rank = $1 WHERE username = $2;

debb8d70382459f9f2099b678d9f598d7a83d7cd.query: SELECT id, sender, receiver, title, body, read, sendTime FROM message WHERE receiver = $1 AND visibleReceiver = TRUE;

e05e98f480160c639324488db30d92daaa852dfb.query: UPDATE torrent_info SET title = $1, description = $2, lastEdit = NOW(), tag = $3 WHERE id = $4 RETURNING id, visible;

e28520a7bc425b2b04b315f4e7619b09ee6e32fd.query: UPDATE users SET role = role | (1::BIGINT << $1) WHERE id = $2;

ef61e890cf4bd716b4acaecdf96d272bd77af23c.query: SELECT poster, visible, free, tag, length FROM torrent_info INNER JOIN torrent ON torrent_info.id = torrent.id WHERE torrent_info.id = $1;

f029f675b52da3bc39332ec1ba87c44a93cb5880.query: SELECT torrent_info.id, title, length, torrent_status.upload, torrent_status.download, torrent_info.free FROM torrent_status INNER JOIN torrent ON torrent_status.tid = torrent.id INNER JOIN torrent_info ON torrent.id = torrent_info.id WHERE torrent_status.finished = TRUE AND uid = $1;

f59a24c9c60d9d3a73353ada408ebcabdc112b80.query: UPDATE torrent_info SET downloading = downloading + $1, uploading = uploading + $2, finished = finished + $3 WHERE id = $4;

fa280ebad16a66dd84469015e704c74e9ee2a6db.query: UPDATE user_info SET money = money + $1 WHERE id = $2;
